author: cmpilato
msg: Finish issue #1731 - svn blame command tries to handle binary files.
(svn_client_blame): Check for binary-ness in the properties of each
successive revision of a file, erroring out if we find such.
(svn_client_log): Update the promise to mention the
SVN_ERR_CLIENT_IS_BINARY_FILE we'll return for binary files.
(svn_cl__blame): Trap and handle the SVN_ERR_CLIENT_IS_BINARY_FILE error.

author: sussman
msg: Fix issue #1726:  make failed direct-URL commits clean up their fs txns.
This affects 'svn mkdir URL', 'svn rm URL', 'svn cp/mv URL URL'.
throws an error, attempt to abort the edit (fs txn) before throwing error.

author: jrepenning
msg: Track latest milestone naming changes, automate somewhat more of the data transformations

author: jrepenning
msg: Add various generated files to svn:ignores list

author: cmpilato
msg: the marshal module for reading from and writing to the "revs" DB
table.  This is not strictly necessary, but it consistifies the
DB format used by cvs2svn, which helps when using ...
... (a new tool) to debug the DB files that cvs2svn produces.
